mapper.insert: insert into plateform_ope_function (ope_code ,fun_code ) select #{opeCode} as ope_code,fun_code from plateform_functions where fun_code in(${functions});
mapper.select: select * from plateform_functions where fun_code in (select fun_code from plateform_ope_function where ope_code = #{opeCode})
select * from plateform_functions where fun_code in (select fun_code from plateform_role_function where role_code = #{roleCode})
mapper.insert: insert into plateform_role_function (role_code ,fun_code ) select #{roleCode} as role_code,fun_code from plateform_functions where fun_code in(${functions});
mapper.select: select * from plateform_functions where fun_path in (select fun_path from plateform_function_rec where sys_role_code in (${_parameter}))
select * from plateform_functions where fun_code in ( select fun_code from plateform_role_function where role_code in (select role_code from plateform_ope_role where ope_code = #{opeCode}))
